1.03.name: wordpress/mingle-friend-requests
1.03.description:
Mingle Friend Requests widget currently displays the following:

Widget to show the following in your sidebar: Current Users Image on all pages Welcomes Users with link to view their profile Users last status update and time If they have any friend requests. If so, it displays the requesters image, link, and ability to accept/ignore

This will only be shown to logged in users. If they are not logged in, it provides the mingle Login and Signup options.
